passage.title: Going to the zoo
passage.paragraph: Today is Sunday. Jack goes to the zoo with his classmates. He puts on his new white T-shirt and yellow cap. He says goodbye to his parents and goes to the bus stop.
The bus stop is near his home. He meets his classmates here. The zoo is very far but a No. 57 bus takes them there. They see a lot of animals in the zoo and they have a good time.
